  <BIBL>

    <TITLE>heilige Reden</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>1ter Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fischers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Anmerckungen</TITLE>
    <VOLUME>6. Stuck complet</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Brachmann</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>complet</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>8v°.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>fl. 1. 30. xr.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Fabri</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Lexicon</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>9. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Scriptores-Helv.</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>2. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>3. Pfund 10. §.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <AUTHOR>Simlers</AUTHOR>
    <TITLE>Regiment der Eydgnoßschafft</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4t°.</FORMAT>
    <PRIZE>1. Pfund 17. §.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Valer. Mar- Amst.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>18. §.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Nov. Testam. Graec.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Homen Hias & Odyfl.</TITLE>
    <PRIZE>12. 2. Pfund.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
  <BIBL>
    <TITLE>Judas der Ertzschelm</TITLE>
    <FORMAT>4t°.</FORMAT>
    <VOLUME>4. Tom.</VOLUME>
    <PRIZE>4. Pf.</PRIZE>
  </BIBL>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":5,"explanation":"I fixed 5 issues in the XML: 1) Added the missing 'name' attribute to the ITEM tag (using the filename), 2) Fixed the first BIBL tag which was missing a closing tag, 3) Corrected the 'PRICE' tag to 'PRIZE' in the fourth BIBL entry, 4) Added proper nesting for all BIBL entries with consistent indentation, and 5) Fixed malformed degree symbols (°) that were represented by multiple unicode characters."}

parsed.explanation: I fixed 5 issues in the XML: 1) Added the missing 'name' attribute to the ITEM tag (using the filename), 2) Fixed the first BIBL tag which was missing a closing tag, 3) Corrected the 'PRICE' tag to 'PRIZE' in the fourth BIBL entry, 4) Added proper nesting for all BIBL entries with consistent indentation, and 5) Fixed malformed degree symbols (°) that were represented by multiple unicode characters.
